column3: Latest;Battambang: The Ministry of Health has confirmed to the public that the analysis of samples of sick monks from a Battambang pagoda sent to the laboratory of the Institut Pasteur du Cambodge on the evening of September 14
column4: 2020 showed negative results of COVID-19 virus.------21 samples taken from a group of 46 monks who showed signs of fever and runny noses in Wat Svay Dangkum
column7: came back as testing for influenza.------The public are reminded to take extra care during the Pchum Benh holidays to avoid the spread of both influenza and COVID-19. ------NKD
